info.name: Crow
info.attribution:
The room layout, game design, and card designs are by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0.

The following graphics are from Pixabay and are available under the Pixabay license.

 - Library image: https://pixabay.com/photos/sunset-crow-lawn-bird-night-glow-2247748/
 - Card back: https://pixabay.com/photos/raven-crow-bird-black-bird-avian-5588641/
 - Rook card: https://pixabay.com/vectors/animal-bird-black-crow-raven-2025562/
info.description: Classic trick taking card game using 4 suited deck with cards 1-14 and a bird card.

fields.text: Do you want to start the next hand?

n7n1.text: Choose cards to discard (if any) and drag to trash icon. Once removed, they cannot be added back unless you reload the game. Then press play to begin.
